#!/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby
def e (str); str.gsub(/[$`\\]/, '\\\\\0'); end
line = STDIN.read col = ENV['TM_LINE_INDEX'].to_i
left, right = line[0...col], line[col..-1]
if left =~ /(.*?)(\[)?(\w+)\s+$/ then lead, bracket, cl = $1, $2, $3 right = line[col+1..-1] unless bracket.nil? print "#{e lead}${1/.+/[/}[[#{e cl} alloc] init$0]${1: autorelease]}" print right.empty? ? ";" : "#{e right}" else # this is only if we were not able to interpret the line print "#{e left}$0#{e right}" end
